import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {addItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import Video from '../video/video.component' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import './collection-details.styles.scss' const CollectionDetails = ({items, addItem}) => { let links = [] for(let i = 5; i <= 12; i++) { links.push( <>
) } return (
{items.map(item => ( <>
{item.type} ${item.price}

{item.name}

{links}

{item.description}

addItem(item)}>Add to Bag Favourite
))}
) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CollectionDetails)
